job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtData ScientistltstronggtltpgtltpgtltstronggtBoston  Massachusetts can be remoteltstronggtltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtTECH STACKltstronggtampnbspObjectOriented Programming languagesltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtOne of the most exciting start ups in the insurance industry is growing fast and looking to add exceptional talent to their data teams Their headquarter is in Europe and they have successfully completed a sizeable round of investments so much that they are now a unicorn valuation of the company is 1 billion  Their involvement in America is not new they have clients using their product there however their local presence is more recent an office for the last 2 years This means that even though you will join a wellestablished data team globally you will have a lot of growth and leadership opportunity in MexicoltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtABOUT THE COMPANYltstronggtltpgtltpgtThis company is a leader in InsurTech and have created their own suite of Insurance products that are already is utilized by dozens of renown insurance companies More than just a rich base of customers they also have a great reputation They have always invested in their data teams and their data scientists play both a technical and a customer facing role Data Scientists help create and shape the products while being in direct contact with the end user of the said products which works well to better understand the client needs and get quick feedback The company has offices in many European capitals as well as branches in South America North America and Asia ltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtABOUT THE ROLEltstronggtltpgtltpgtYou will have a technical role as well as a customer facing role and the focus of this role is around the production deployment of the client pipelinesltpgtltulgtltligtYou will work on data projects from endtoend  from the gathering data in real time or batches to the cleaning and info extracting until the industrialization of the models in productionltligtltligtYoull be focused on RampampD as well where youll often be working on the product to improve it and always keep it innovative There will be a lot of Machine Learning involved NLP Fraud detection Chatbots etcltligtltligtAs a customer facing Data Scientist you will closely work with project managers and sales colleagues to deliver the product to the user client at times directly speaking to clients to better understand their needs and improve the solutionsltligtltulgtltpgtampnbspltpgtltpgtltstronggtSKILLS ampamp EXPERIENCEltstronggtltpgtltpgtThe chosen candidate will haveltpgtltulgtltligtA Masters degree in a relevant field Computer Science Engineering Maths Stats Data ScienceltligtltligtStrong coding skills in an OOP Object orient Programming language  this role requires you to deploy data pipelines in productionltligtltligtAbility to communicate to clients You wont be required to sell or make sales pitches but youll speak to clients in order to better do your technical jobltligtltligtYou are a native English speakerltligtltulgtltpgtltpgt
